title: Person of interest: Do I Have To Teach You About Sharing
author: Amonia33
comment: This intro was the reason many of us started watching the show.
Still one of the greatest shows ever on TV. One of the best roles Caviezal has ever done.
When he's taking a deep breath before he attacks it's like he's telling himself not to hurt Anton. He's telling himself to be calm and just breathe. Then Anton pressed his luck.
He’s closing his eyes and praying for the strength to not kill every punk on the train...
Best pilot ever! This scene sets the viewing audience up for his character’s quiet strength, inner turmoil, and kickass fighting skills which delight us in coming episodes.
description: Person of interest S01E01 - This Does Not Belong To Me. Picture courtesy of CBS.
